solution_line_template: Being {mary_height_fraction} of her brother's height, Mary is {brother_height} * {mary_height_fraction} = <<{brother_height}*{mary_height_fraction}={mary_current_height}>>{mary_current_height} cm.
To reach the minimum height and ride Kingda Ka, Mery needs to grow {min_height} - {mary_current_height} = <<{min_height}-{mary_current_height}={height_needed}>>{height_needed} cm.
